phrs.translation: 安全帽；（飞行员，摩托车驾驶员等的）防撞头盔

sentences.sentence: Two white-helmeted officers gunned their engines into life.
sentences.translation: 两名戴着白色头盔的军官一下子把发动机发动起来。

sentences.sentence: A picture of Boxers charging into pith-helmeted foreign soldiers covers a wall of their practice room.
sentences.translation: 村医演奏室的壁画中，拳民正向带着头盔的外国士兵刺去。

sentences.sentence: To make it worse, there were no police to keep them in check. Not one blue-helmeted officer in sight.
sentences.translation: 更糟糕的是，没有警察维持秩序，也看不到有戴着蓝头盔的官员。
